alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 11 at 2:23PM MDT until April 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 MPH with gusts of 40 to 50 MPH expected. * WHERE...The Frank Church Wilderness, Big Lost Highlands, Challis and Pahsimeroi Valleys, and Lost River Range, including but not limited to Clayton, Challis, Willow Creek Summit, and the Copper Basin. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Unsecured objects may be blown around.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range
